short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful bookmark manager with advanced organization features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Chrome bookmarks into a powerful, organized knowledge base. Bookmark Enhancer modernizes Chrome's bookmark management with an intuitive, feature-rich interface that helps you find, organize, and access your bookmarks faster than ever.

Why Use Bookmark Enhancer?

- Smart Search: Instantly find any bookmark with real-time search across titles and URLs
- Flexible Views: Switch between list and grid views to browse your bookmarks the way you prefer
- Quick Edit: Edit bookmark details directly from the popup interface without opening new tabs
- Visual Organization: Easily manage bookmark folders with an intuitive tree structure
- Modern Interface: Clean, responsive design with keyboard shortcuts for power users
- Space Efficient: Compact yet readable layout shows more bookmarks at once
- Smooth Navigation: Expand/collapse folders and navigate your bookmark hierarchy effortlessly
